title: Lae'zel

thout Astarion , tell him camp location When talking to Gandrel with Astarion , reveal Astarion identity Drink from the well outside of Auntie Ethel's teahouse Convince a Surrendered Hag Ethel to let Mayrina go and give you power With a Surrendered Hag Ethel choose to execute Ethel

When Meeting Sentinel Olak in the Goblin Camp Entrance, Pass the Deceive/Nature option then say you "cant be serious", then fling poo at the guards. (Athletics check work inconsistently while "Can't be serious" works
